strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_DESC:
The Nemesis Huntress engages against enemies slowly but ruthlessly with her deadly longbow and double headed hatchet.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Score headshots with Heavy Bolt to maximize damage to foes.

< ! > Make use of your Laser Hatchet and Explosive Bolt to clear crowds effectively and efficiently.

< ! > Phase Blink is an effective tool to quickly relocate and score a clean shot on an enemy.

< ! > It's all about skill.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_OUTRO: ..and so she left, finding a new home far away.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_FAILURE: ..and so she returned, settling down at last.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_LORE:
It was quiet along the sulfur-permeated hillside. Even the animals that lived there were curiously quiet right now. Only the occasional sound of a caustic geyser erupting disturbed the peace.


		Tucked away in a small cave about forty meters from the bottom of the valley, a single survivor sat crouched in anticipation, gazing through a visor. She saw the entire valley for what it truly was- countless hits, just waiting to be made. As soon as something even dared to poke their head out… Well, just the head would be the best case, truthfully.


		Something moved. Bow unholstered, fully drawn. That target was already dead. Just needed to wait for the perfect moment…


		…There. A single arrow whizzed through the air, hitting its target square in the back. They flailed a little bit, trying to pull it out from between their shoulders… until the arrow detonated in their body, painting the bottom of the valley a beautiful hue of rufous red.


		The assassin chuckled to herself. It was always so cute when they panicked.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION:
All <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strike Chance</style> is converted into <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strike Damage</style>. Entering combat highlights enemy <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style>.
<style=cIsHealth>NAME TOO EDGY?</style>
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_BOW_DESC:
Hold to charge an arrow for <style=cIsDamage>50%-450%</style> damage. Capable of striking <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style>.
<style=cIsHealth>DAMAGE TOO HIGH?</style>
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_ALT_DESC: <style=cIsHealth>CURRENTLY NON-FUNCTIONAL.</style> Hold to charge up to <style=cIsDamage>7</style> arrows for <style=cIsDamage>50%</style> damage each.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_DESC: Throw a <style=cIsDamage>boomeranging</style> hatchet that <style=cIsDamage>pierces</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>360%</style> damage. Deals <style=cIsDamage>20%</style> more damage every time it passes through an enemy.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_UTILITY_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Disappear</style> and <style=cIsUtility>teleport</style> a short distance. Can store up to <style=cIsUtility>3</style> charges.
<style=cIsHealth>TOO BLAND?</style>
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_SPECIAL_DESC:
Replace your next arrow with an <style=cIsDamage>explosive bolt</style>, detonating on impact for <style=cIsDamage>800%</style> damage.
<style=cIsHealth>NOT SATISFYING ENOUGH?</style>
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_EXPLOSIVE_BOW_DESC: Hold to charge an <style=cIsDamage>explosive</style> bolt, detonating on impact for <style=cIsDamage>800%</style> damage.
